detectors.description:

		- yfi.safeTransfer(msg.sender,reward) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#703)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#556)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#696)
		- lastUpdateTime = lastTimeRewardApplicable() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#647)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#696)
		- rewardPerTokenStored = rewardPerToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#646)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#696)
		- rewards[msg.sender] = 0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#702)
		- rewards[account] = earned(account) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#649)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#696)
		- userRewardPerTokenPaid[account] = rewardPerTokenStored (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#650)
